title: What could be the best use of obsolete LP gramophone records? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is no way I would agree that gramophone records are in any way obsolete. They are making a comeback in a big way and there are quite a few people that prefer a gramophone over the other commonly used formats including audio CDS which can be called obsolete. There are a lot of people selling players and you can probably find one for yourself quite easily. The uses are many, and the most important is listening to them. :)

I dispute that records are obsolete. The music they contain has not been recreated digitally in many cases. In some cases that music can’t be reproduced because the masters have been destroyed. The Day the Music Burned. No, they are a source of endless pleasure for their owners. The best use is to listen and enjoy.
